questions.quote: You know I still don't know how you can call lunch with me a business expense.
Are we going to be sitting here when we're sixty like two idiots?
Your Honor, I'm only trying to establish Mister Kramer's fragile emotional state, my entire case depends on it.
Wait a minute I need those keys. I wont be able to get into my apartment.
Are you kidding? I have seen the changes in you the past couple of years. Man, you have grown. You've matured.
Uh, yeah, I think I do. I can never find anything in here. Ah, here it is. So, that Joe Mayo throws the worst parties, doesn't he? So what was your job?
Him and his friends are probably peeing all over the place. You want to call the Department of Social Services? Oh, it's Saturday. They're closed today. My luck.
Well if I wanted it I wouldn't be throwing it away, *Ein-stein*.
So, Puddy, I decided I'm gonna go with another 900 convertible.
I'll tell you what -- you can take me out to dinner sometime.
